title: WTB T206 Mathewson dark cap- different backs
author: Phillies*phan

posts.post_title: WTB T206 Mathewson dark cap- different backs
posts.post_content: I want to start a dark cap back run.  I need them all.  Condition should be at least vg unless it's a real tough back.  [url]E-mail-dmb102175@comcast.net[/url].

[quote name="Phillies*phan" post=950420]I want to start a dark cap back run.  If you have one with a tough back I'd be interested.  Condition should be at least vg unless it's a real tough back.  [url]E-mail-dmb102175@comcast.net[/url].[/QUOTE]

Did you get that American Beauty that recently sold on ebay?  I was the underbidder at $1,450 and really regret I didn't go higher.

I have a Carolina Brights dark cap Matty, SGC 30, but it's filling the Carolina Backs slot in my HOF back run.  I'd probably need to get something tough that I can't seem to fill, like a Drum HOFer, and I'd also have refill that CB HOFer slot.  

David R
All I have now is money.  No Drums
Crossed my first one of the list thanks to a net54 member.  Looking for any dark hat Matty back including Piedmonts and Sweet Caps.  No beaters please.
Also added Old Mill and Sov 460.  Still need a bunch.  I know someone has one in the back of the safe :D  [url]dmb102175@comcast.net[/url]
